text: Can we please for the love of everything make it so that the initial state for running a watch is WITH the `--disable-initial` parameter active??!?!

The number of times we have had multiple developers working in (what I know is less than ideal) the same portal simultaneously and have had revisions due to an accidental startup with that parameter not set is almost inundating

for instance, I accidently just finger bombed the last bit  that was that parameter and added a backwards slash, due to working on a german keyboard and it started running the whole thing.... not ideal
